scheduled_maintenances.name: [Global][Hosted Private Cloud] - VMware vCenter Server + Hosts upgrade

incident_updates.body: As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Hosted Private Cloud offer. Start time : 22/07/2024 07:00 UTC End time : 25/07/2024 16:00 UTC Service impact : Management unavailable for 1h and all hosts will be put in maintenance (Vmotion). Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we are rolling out an upgrade for hosts and vCenter Server services . An individual communication will be sent before the upgrade begins. Thank you for your understanding.
